w.p: This is a very simple browser-like application to show the LCUI and LCUI Router features.
A freely available software library for building user interfaces. It is written in C and supports the use of XML and CSS to describe the graphical interface of simple desktop apps.
The official router for LCUI. It provides a similar development experience to the Vue Router and make building multiple views applications with LCUI a breeze.

A UI component framework for building LCUI application, it provides basic styles for typography and elements, simple layout system, CSS components and utilities. Its CSS code is based Bootstrap, so its usage is basically the same as Boostrap.
Command line interface for rapid LCUI development. It providing: mininal LCUI project template, generator for components and views, internationalization (i18n), router config file compilation.
